select c.contact_name||'<'||c.contact_email||'>' AS email from BFRC_WEB_SITE s,BFRC_WEB_SITE_FEEDBACK f,BFRC_WEB_SITE_FEEDBACK_TYPE ft,BFRC_WEB_SITE_CONTACT c,BFRC_WEB_SITE_CONTACT_TYPE ct,BFRC_WEB_SITE_FEEDBACK_CONTACT fc where f.SITE_ID=s.SITE_ID and f.FEEDBACK_TYPE_ID=ft.FEEDBACK_TYPE_ID and fc.CONTACT_ID=c.CONTACT_ID and fc.CONTACT_TYPE_ID=ct.CONTACT_TYPE_ID and fc.FEEDBACK_ID=f.FEEDBACK_ID and c.contact_email not in ('ZONE_MANAGER','DISTRICT_MANAGER','ZONE_OPERATIONS_MANAGER','NA_MANAGER','REGION_MANAGER') and s.SITE_NAME=:siteName and ft.FEEDBACK_TYPE_NAME=:feedbackType and f.FEEDBACK_SUBJECT=:feedbackSubject and ct.CONTACT_TYPE_NAME=:contactType
union
select d.name||'<'||d.email_address||'>' AS email from DISTRICT_MANAGER d,STORE s where s.district_id=d.district_id and s.store_number=:storeNumber and exists ( select c.contact_email from BFRC_WEB_SITE s,BFRC_WEB_SITE_FEEDBACK f,BFRC_WEB_SITE_FEEDBACK_TYPE ft,BFRC_WEB_SITE_CONTACT c,BFRC_WEB_SITE_CONTACT_TYPE ct,BFRC_WEB_SITE_FEEDBACK_CONTACT fc where f.SITE_ID=s.SITE_ID and f.FEEDBACK_TYPE_ID=ft.FEEDBACK_TYPE_ID and fc.CONTACT_ID=c.CONTACT_ID and fc.CONTACT_TYPE_ID=ct.CONTACT_TYPE_ID and fc.FEEDBACK_ID=f.FEEDBACK_ID and c.contact_email='DISTRICT_MANAGER' and s.SITE_NAME=:siteName and ft.FEEDBACK_TYPE_NAME=:feedbackType and f.FEEDBACK_SUBJECT=:feedbackSubject and ct.CONTACT_TYPE_NAME=:contactType )
union
select z.name||'<'||z.email_address||'>' AS email from zone_manager z,hr_districts h,store s where to_number(z.zone_id)=to_number(h.district_zone) and h.district_id=s.district_id and manager_type in ('ZVP','ZQM','ZMM') and s.store_number=:storeNumber and exists ( select c.contact_email from BFRC_WEB_SITE s,BFRC_WEB_SITE_FEEDBACK f,BFRC_WEB_SITE_FEEDBACK_TYPE ft,BFRC_WEB_SITE_CONTACT c,BFRC_WEB_SITE_CONTACT_TYPE ct,BFRC_WEB_SITE_FEEDBACK_CONTACT fc where f.SITE_ID=s.SITE_ID and f.FEEDBACK_TYPE_ID=ft.FEEDBACK_TYPE_ID and fc.CONTACT_ID=c.CONTACT_ID and fc.CONTACT_TYPE_ID=ct.CONTACT_TYPE_ID and fc.FEEDBACK_ID=f.FEEDBACK_ID and c.contact_email='ZONE_MANAGER' and s.SITE_NAME=:siteName and ft.FEEDBACK_TYPE_NAME=:feedbackType and f.FEEDBACK_SUBJECT=:feedbackSubject and ct.CONTACT_TYPE_NAME=:contactType )
union
